groups.name: env.printer
groups.description: Configuration properties for the Environment Printer starter.

properties.name: env.printer.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the environment printer functionality. When disabled, no environment variables will be printed at startup and the endpoint will not be available.

properties.name: env.printer.endpoint-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the HTTP endpoint for environment variables. When disabled, only startup logging will occur.

properties.name: env.printer.project-only
properties.description: Filter to show only environment variables actually used in the project. When enabled, scans configuration files (application.properties, application.yml) and source code to identify which environment variables are referenced, and displays only those variables.
